title: Most children ever live in conflict zones: report
text:
Most children ever live in conflict zones: report 11:30am GMT - 01:58 
A report from Save the Children reveals that 350 million children now live in conflict zones, many of them subjected to grave violations such as killing, sexual violence and recruitment as soldiers. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A report from Save the Children reveals that 350 million children now live in conflict zones, many of them subjected to grave violations such as killing, sexual violence and recruitment as soldiers. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2szlMSV
